quote: When one feels oneself smitten by love for a woman, one ought to say to oneself, “What are her surroundings? What has been her life? All one’s future happiness lies in the answer.
quote_letters: WHEN ONE FEELS ONESELF SMITTEN BY LOVE FOR A WOMAN ONE OUGHT TO SAY TO ONESELF WHAT ARE HER SURROUNDINGS WHAT HAS BEEN HER LIFE ALL ONES FUTURE HAPPINESS LIES IN THE ANSWER
